description: Table to store the next update dates, actions and occurrences remaining for a questionnaire in the questionnaire series answer record.

columns.name: SERIES_ANS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Series Answer record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: QNR_NEXT_UPD_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the next time this Series Answer record is updated

columns.name: QNR_NXT_UPD_ACT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The action that will occur the next time this Series Answer record is updated 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Enable


Disable


Send Reminder Message

columns.name: QNR_NEXT_UPD_LINE
columns.description: This column stores the questionnaire ID corresponding to the next update date.

columns.name: QNR_OCCUR_REMAINING
columns.description: This item stores the number of occurrences remaining for the questionnaire.
